name: F-Secure Corporation
goal:
To raise awareness of cyber security threats and provide means to counter such threats.

Founded in 1988, F-Secure today has over 1,000 employees, over 24 offices around the globe, and is headquartered in Helsinki, Finland.

F-Secure has tens of millions of consumer customers and over 100,000 corporate customers around the world.
interests: Digital economy and society, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Research and innovation, Single market
euInitiatives:
Digital Single Market
GDPR
ePrivacy Regulation
Dual Use Export Control Regulation
Cybersecurity Act
Telecomms package
HORIZON 2020
NIS
